message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special offer for this exceptional item. Considering its worth to both parties, I suggest a purchase price of $9500. This offer allows you to acquire the product at a considerable discount compared to its market value while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
